程序包的使用
org.springframework.format.annotation

  • 使用org.springframework.format.annotation的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.format.annotation
    Annotations for declaratively configuring field formatting rules.
    org.springframework.format.datetime
    Formatters for java.util.Date properties.
    org.springframework.format.datetime.joda
    Integration with Joda-Time for formatting Joda date and time types as well as standard JDK Date types.
    org.springframework.format.datetime.standard
    Integration with the JSR-310 java.time package in JDK 8.
    org.springframework.format.number
    Formatters for java.lang.Number properties.
    org.springframework.format.number.money
    Integration with the JSR-354 javax.money package.
  • org.springframework.format.annotation使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    DateTimeFormat.ISO
    Common ISO date time format patterns.
    NumberFormat.Style
    Common number format styles.
  • org.springframework.format.datetime使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    DateTimeFormat
    Declares that a field or method parameter should be formatted as a date or time.
    DateTimeFormat.ISO
    Common ISO date time format patterns.
  • org.springframework.format.datetime.joda使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    DateTimeFormat
    Declares that a field or method parameter should be formatted as a date or time.
    DateTimeFormat.ISO
    Common ISO date time format patterns.
  • org.springframework.format.datetime.standard使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    DateTimeFormat
    Declares that a field or method parameter should be formatted as a date or time.
  • org.springframework.format.number使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    NumberFormat
    Declares that a field or method parameter should be formatted as a number.
  • org.springframework.format.number.money使用的org.springframework.format.annotation中的类 
    类和说明
    NumberFormat
    Declares that a field or method parameter should be formatted as a number.
